solution_line_template: Crossing the lake two times (back and forth) would take {hours_one_way} * {num_crossings} = <<{hours_one_way}*{num_crossings}={total_hours}>>{total_hours} hours.
So Tom would need to pay an assistant {total_hours} * {assistant_rate} = $<<{total_hours}*{assistant_rate}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}.
